ml:Event.ml:title: Next MarkUPS Meeting to Take Place on February 24th!

p.ml:teaser: The next Mark-UPS user group will be meeting on Wednesday February 24th. This is a unique occasion to hear Chris Biow, Federal CTO talk about MarkLogic's new offering in the Cloud. Mark-UPS, MarkLogic User Participation Sessions, is run by Telly Stroumbis.

ml:description.p: MarkLogic user groups offer an opportunity learn more about MarkLogic Server and collaborate with other MarkLogic users. Pizza and soft drinks will be provided and everyone will be entered into drawings for several giveaways provided by MarkLogic.

In this presentation Chris will demonstrate MarkLogic's new cloud deployment options and talk about how they are being used today within the MarkLogic development community. Attendees will see how to instantiate a MarkLogic AMI live on Amazon EC2 and learn about best practices for using MarkLogic on the EC2 platform. Finally, Chris will give a preview of planned cloud-related product enhancements. This is a great opportunity to provide feedback and influence the cloud computing initiative at MarkLogic.

ml:details.ml:location: 131 National Business Parkway, Suite 120, Annapolis Junction, MD, 20701
